ModMetaData.name: Berries and Milk: No food poisoning
ModMetaData.author: cyto
ModMetaData.description: Removes the food poisoning risk for berries and milk. Also removes it for insect jelly. Also attempts to remove it from all other "tasty raw" foods, like fruit. Compatible with VGP Vegetable Garden, Vanilla Plants Expanded, Vanilla Plants Expanded - More Plants. Can be added and removed mid-save.
